name: Unlit (ChilledHeightsStudios)
description:
A short puzzle horror game loosely based on 1997 Lights Out handheld game.

Story

Dared by your friends on a night out to enter the local "Haunted House" only to find the stories were true. Quickly realizing light is the only thing that keeps the spirit at bay, you must turn all the lights on if you hope to survive.

If you enjoyed the game I would greatly appreciate everyone's feedback as this is my first game I've made outside of a game jam. If you would like to further support me a donation here would be awesome. It will help me to further pursue my dream of being an indie game dev.
